EWeLink is a free smart home APP. 

EWeLink can control all smart home products from ITEAD and cooperated partners. It supports remotely turn on/off connected electrical devices, set timing schedules, share devices, manage group and scene. With eWeLink, you can adjust color and brightness for multiple RGB LED, monitor real-time temperature and humidity from Sonoff TH, monitor home environment data, and much more. 

More devices are under development, please stay tuned.

resources.string: Press and hold the pairing button for 5s to let the device led fast blinks
To let Sonoff dimming LED enter into pairing state, please turn it on and off for 3 times, the time gap between turn on and off should be 2s, the LED indicator will fast blink.
Unable to find the device, please check the following configuration
Communication process error, please operate by following the instructions
Please check Mobile Security and Antivirus software permission setting, make sure eWeLink can access to WiFi and location.
Your device is not in pairing mode, enter into pairing mode now.
Failed to auto-connect to device WiFi, please manually connect it. Steps: phone Settings->Wi-Fi, connect with the WiFi "ITEAD-******" with password \"12345678\".
Please confirm you have entered correct WiFi password
Failed, please confirm your mobile network works normally, and try again later
Then return to eWeLink. System WiFi setting

Single channel socket/switch support loop timer now! Loop timer can be auto-executed every preset time(say 1hr), and continue for a shorter preset time(say 20min). Supported firmware version 1.5.0 and higher.
Want your family and friends control your devices? Just share your devices to their accounts!
Unable to edit. Please retry after deleting or disabling existing timers.
No timers currently. Tap below button to add now!
No countdown timers currently. Tap below button to add now!
Only 20 timers allowed(include countdown and loop timer)
Only 8 enabled timers allowed(include countdown and loop timer)
